name: popular_posts
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool reddit.
Tool description: Please join our telegram channel to get notified about updates. https://t.me/social_miner_news
API description: Fetches popular posts from Reddit based on the given sort type.

sort.description: The sorting method for the posts. Accepted values are 'new' and 'hot'.

cursor.description: An optional cursor for pagination to fetch the next set of results. Defaults to None.
